PDAM Janji Aliran Tak Putus Saat Penyambungan Pipa Transmisi Purwosari
05 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Murni Prabowo


PDAM Janji Aliran Tak Putus Saat Penyambungan Pipa Transmisi Purwosari

KBRN, Surakarta: Perumda Air Minum Daerah (PDAM) Surakarta memastikan pemindahan pipa transmisi air bersih di perlintasan sebidang Purwosari tidak akan berdampak terhadap pelanggan. Tim telah menyiapkan peralatan untuk pengelasan dalam air agar aliran PDAM tidak terputus.Direksi PDAM Tri Atmojo Sukomulyo mengatakan, proses penyambungan pipa transmisi air bersih milik PDAM Surakarta di sekitar perlintasan sebidang Purwosari, akan dilakukan  tanpa disertai pemutusan aliran air kepada para konsumen. Pipa-pipa transmisi yang terhubung langsung dengan jaringan pipa utama tersebut akan dimaksimalkan, guna mendistribusikan air kepada para pelanggan.
“Ada pipa-pipa penyalur yang tersebar di enam titik, yakni kawasan Faroka, Jalan Transito, Pasar Kabangan, Baron, dan Penumping. Pipa-pipa itu akan kami optimalkan sebagai jalur distribusi sementara, selama proses penyambungan pipa transmisi utama di Purwosari,” kata Tri Atmojo seusai serah terima jabatan direksi kepada Plt PDAM, di Kantor PDAM, Senin (04/11/2019)
Menurut Tri Atmojo, pemindahan jalur distribusi air bersih itu terpaksa dilakukan PDAM lantaran pemutusan aliran air sangat berisiko terhadap proses distribusi selanjutnya. "Pipa di Jalan Slamet Riyadi ini adalah pipa peninggalan Belanda, sehingga kami tidak ingin ada masalah pada kemudian hari. Selain itu pengembalian debit air ke kondisi semula juga membutuhkan waktu tidak sebentar, seandainya distribusi air dimatikan total,” tandasnya.Tri Atmojo menjamin, pasokan air kepada para pelanggan tetap terlayani kendati pipa transmisi utama di Purwosari harus dipotong dan disambungkan ke jaringan pipa baru. Untuk pelanggan di Solo bagian timur, akan tetap mendapat pasokan karena jaringan pipa-pipa penyalur itu kembali terkoneksi dengan pipa utama di sekitar Jalan Agus Salim dan Jalan Perintis Kemerdekaan. 
“Khusus pelanggan di sekitar lokasi penyambungan pipa, debit air yang dipasok ke lokasi mereka malah berpotensi lebih besar. Tapi kami tetap akan menyosialisasikan penyambungan pipa tersebut kepada para pelanggan yang akan terdampak.”

PDAM Promises Uninterrupted Flow When Connecting Purwosari Transmission Pipes
05 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Murni Prabowo


PDAM Promises Uninterrupted Flow When Connecting Purwosari Transmission Pipes

KBRN, Surakarta: Surakarta Regional Water Supply Company (PDAM) ensures that the transfer of clean water transmission pipelines at a Purwosari level crossing will not affect customers. The team has prepared equipment for welding in water so that the flow of the PDAM is not interrupted. PDAM Director Tri Atmojo Sukomulyo said that the process of connecting the piped water transmission pipeline of the Surakarta PDAM around the Purwosari level crossing will be carried out without the interruption of water flow to consumers. Transmission pipes connected directly to the main pipeline will be maximized, in order to distribute water to customers.
"There are distribution pipes that are spread in six points, namely Faroka, Transito Street, Kabangan Market, Baron, and Penumping. We will optimize the pipes as a temporary distribution channel, during the connection process of the main transmission pipeline in Purwosari, "Tri Atmojo said after the handover of the directors' position to the Acting PDAM, at the PDAM Office, Monday (04/11/2019)
According to Tri Atmojo, the removal of the clean water distribution line was forced to be done by the PDAM because the cut off of the water flow was very risky for the subsequent distribution process. "The pipeline on Jalan Slamet Riyadi is a pipeline from the Netherlands, so we do not want any problems in the future. Besides returning the water debit to its original condition also requires time, if the water distribution is completely shut down," he said. Tri Atmojo guarantees, supply water to customers is still served even though the main transmission pipeline in Purwosari must be cut and connected to a new pipeline, for customers in eastern Solo, will continue to get supplies because the pipeline network is re-connected with the main pipeline around Jalan Agus Salim and Pioneer Road of Independence.
"Especially for customers around the pipe connection location, the water debit supplied to their location has the potential to be even greater. But we will still socialize the pipeline connection to the affected customers. "
